TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content: What!? We get ninja'd hardcore!

i dont even

I wish i knew witch(non pro-ana) internet-ness group(brony, furry, cod fanboy....) im falling into in somewhat detail?

Granted he corrupts it and you fail your test.

I wish I didn't have so much homework.

Granted, It's pastafarian

I wish I've got a personnal pastafarian priest

granted, but everything goes wrong.

I wish something that i dont want to happen to me doesnt happen.

Granted,but you a tests everyday,for all of your class(yes,I'm sadistic > : )

EDIT: I got ninja'd,again

Bah, you in the way of my post

Granted, nothing was posted there

I wish that something i dont want to happen to me doesnt happen or is this reverse psychology?

Error 404 : wish not found (Ninja'd me again!)

I wish that there was less ninjaging on this thread

Granted, but whats the fun in that

I wish i was a animal. Also that mrrpamplemousse will continue the google image war.

Granted,but you have to wait a full month before someone answer you.

I wish this post won't get ninja'd

EDIT:my wish hasn't been granted

Granted, but no one responds to you afterwards.

I wish that the internet didnt fight over bronies

Granted,it now fight over COD.

I wish i could learn more digit of pi(I have no life )

True, but all you remember is pi.

I wish that either bronys would control the web or the web controlled the web, anything to just get peace of some sort.

Impossibru! just see what they have done!

and the rule 34 stuffs

I wish that I could do a video like that
where can I find the rule 34?

Don't search for rule 34! DON'T!!!

(go on know your meme, but NOT ON GOOGLE!)

I wish people didn't wanted to know such things

Granted, but the masses of haters converge on it(and wtf was that video?)

I wish that i didn't care about bronies.(as in im sick of choosing a side in all this)

What can I find the other rules then?

EDIT:been ninja'd by someone who have been ninja'd

Can someone answer this?

I wish that i didn't care about bronies.(as in im sick of choosing a side in all this)

ok,but I'm sure I will be ninja'd.

EDIT:I didn't been ninja'd!

Granted,but now you care about nothing,not even KSP

EDIT2:I wish I could remember to make a wish.
